Historic 1924 Pacific radio link celebrated in Gisborne and Argentina https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/05/22/call-for-a-street-to-be-named-after-pioneer-radio-operator/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/05/22/call-for-a-street-to-be-named-after-pioneer-radio-operator/ Wynsley WrigleyZoom call reunites NZ and Argentina Tue, 21 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Mayor Rehette Stoltz and Gisborne Amateur Radio Club members (from left) Aidan Kirk (president), Scott Casley, Rusty Barker, Laura Jackson and Steve Main (vice-president) with members of the Radio Club of Argentina (on the screen) commemorate the historic event of a century whem radio hams from Gisborne and Buenos Aires made contact with each other across the Pacific -10,000 kilometres from each other. Photo /Paul Rickard
